pages.text: 75|20|kadaapi nahin[1], balki tum prem karate ho sheeghr praapt hone vaalee cheez (sansaar) se.
75|21|aur chhod dete ho paralok ko.
75|22|bahut-se mukh us din praphull honge.
75|23|apane paalanahaar kee or dekh rahe honge.
75|24|aur bahut-se mukh udaas honge.
75|25|vah samajh rahe honge ki unake saath kada vyavahaar kiya jaayega.
75|26|kadaapi nahin[1], jab pahunchegee praan hansaliyon (galon) tak.
75|27|aur kaha jaayegaah kaun jhaad-phoonk karane vaala hai
75|28|aur vishvaas ho jaayega ki ye (sansaar se) judaee ka samay hai.
75|29|aur mil jaayegee pindalee, pindalee[1] se.
75|30|tere paalanahaar kee or usee din jaana hai.
75|31|to na usane saty ko maana aur na namaaz padhee.
75|32|kintu jhuthalaaya aur munh pher liya.
75|33|phir, gaya apane parijanon kee or akadata haa.
75|34|shok hai tere lie, phir shok hai.
75|35|phir shok hai tere lie, phir shok hai.
75|36|kya manushy samajhata hai ki vah chhod diya jaayega vyarth
75|37|kya vah nahin tha veery kee boond, jo (garbhaashay mein) boond-boond giraee jaatee hai.
75|38|phir vah bandha rakt hua, phir allaah ne use paida kiya aur use baraabar banaaya.
75|39|phir usaka jodaah nar aur naaree banaaya.
75|40|to kya vah saamarthyavaan nahin ki murdon ko jeevit kar de
76|1|kya vyateet hua manushy par yug ka ek samay, jab vah koee vicharchit[1] vastu na tha
76|2|hamane hee paida kiya manushy ko mishrit (mile hue) veery[1] se, taaki usakee pareeksha len aur banaaya use sunane tatha dekhane vaala.
76|3|hamane use raah darsha dee.[1] (ab) vah chaahe to krtagy bane athava krtaghn.
76|4|nihsandeh, hamane taiyaar kee kaafiron (krtaghnon) ke lie zanjeer tatha tauq aur dahakatee agni.
76|5|nishchay sadaachaaree (krtagy) piyenge aise pyaale se jisamen kapoor mishrit hoga.
